display_long_description:
# Welcome to Zibby!

Zibby is not just game. Zibby is lifestyle. Enter the world, be the Zibby.

# Bonk & Snack
See that Spitflower? It has gems inside. BONK the Spitflower. Gem falls out? Don't put in pocket. EAT IT. Crunchy victory.

[media]

# Shop Like a Boss
Why look boring? Go to store. We have everything! Buy funny hat. Buy cool gadget. Buy shiny things. Look fresh, impress friends. Spend your hard-earned cash here.

[media]

# Dig Deep, Eat Dark
Grab pickaxe. Find rock. Smash rock! Oh look, coal pieces! Are you hungry? Yes. Eat the coal. Mining is tasty work.

[media]

# Zoom and Boing
Walking is for slow people. Use Jumppad: BOING! Fly high. Use Zipline: WHOOSH! Go fast. Explore the world like a pro. Never touch ground again.

[media]

# The Circle of Life
Simple life. Good life. Walk -> Grab -> Bonk Mob -> EAT. Mine Rock -> Get Coal -> EAT. -> Sell loot -> Get rich -> Repeat. This is the Zibby way.

[media]

**Rise through the skies. Serve the kingdom. Become Zibby.**
